books.author: by Brandon Stanton
books.description: Photos and stories of people from over 40 countries collected by the creator of “Humans of New York.”
books.name: HUMANS

books.author: by Jerry Seinfeld
books.description: The comedian shares material he collected in an accordion folder over the last 45 years.
books.name: IS THIS ANYTHING?

books.author: by Roman Mars and Kurt Kohlstedt
books.description: A look at the design and architecture of various and sometimes unexpected elements that make cities function.
books.name: THE 99% INVISIBLE CITY

books.author: by Bob Woodward
books.description: Based on 17 on-the-record interviews with President Trump and other reporting, the Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist details the president’s perspective on multiple crises.
books.name: RAGE

books.author: by Isabel Wilkerson
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist examines aspects of caste systems across civilizations and reveals a rigid hierarchy in America today.
books.name: CASTE

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The ninth book in the conservative commentator’s Killing series focuses on conflicts with Native Americans.
books.name: KILLING CRAZY HORSE

books.author: by Candace Owens
books.description: The conservative commentator makes her case that Black Americans should part ways with the Democratic Party.
books.name: BLACKOUT

books.author: by John O. Brennan
books.description: The former C.I.A. director recounts key moments from his career and evaluates national security policies and actions.
books.name: UNDAUNTED

books.author: by Mariah Carey with Michaela Angela Davis
books.description: The career highlights, public life and private struggles of the singer and songwriter.
books.name: THE MEANING OF MARIAH CAREY

books.author: by Glennon Doyle
books.description: The activist and public speaker describes her journey of listening to her inner voice.
books.name: UNTAMED

books.author: by Ted Cruz
books.description: The Republican senator from Texas gives his views on what might happen if liberals gain a simple majority on the Supreme Court.
books.name: ONE VOTE AWAY

books.author: by Fareed Zakaria
books.description: The CNN host posits what might happen on the other side of the Covid-19 pandemic.
books.name: TEN LESSONS FOR A POST-PANDEMIC WORLD

books.author: by Pete Buttigieg
books.description: The former mayor of South Bend and 2020 Democratic presidential candidate prescribes ways to restore what he considers an essential element of America’s democracy.
books.name: TRUST

books.author: by Robin DiAngelo
books.description: Historical and cultural analyses on what causes defensive moves by white people and how this inhibits cross-racial dialogue.
books.name: WHITE FRAGILITY

books.author: by Lenny Kravitz with David Ritz
books.description: The musician reflects on how opposing elements created balance in his life.
books.name: LET LOVE RULE
